info.title: dzelda-api
info.summary: The backend API for Dzelda: a free and open source language learning website.

tags.name: auth
tags.description: Related to authentication: sign up, login, password reset, etc.

201.description:
Created

A new user is created and returned. If `initialLanguage` is supplied, that language is added to the languages the user is learning.

200.description:
OK

Returns user info if user is logged in and username is "me" or if it belongs to the currently logged in user.

OK

User is logged in. Returns authentication token.

delete.description: Delete account of currently logged in user, and everything associated with it. This action cannot be undone.

200.description:
OK

Returns a list of languages that match query.

OK

Returns a list of collections that match query. If the user is logged in `vocabLevels` are appended to eaech of them to show how many vocabs of each level the collection has.

201.description:
Created

A new collection is created and returned.

200.description:
OK

Updates the collection and returns it.

get.description: Get list of saved all vocabs.
Get a list of langauges the user is learning.

post.description: Add a language to languages the user is learning.

delete.description: Remove a language from list of languages the user is learning.

get.description: Get the list of collections the user has bookmarked.
Get the list of texts the user has viewed.

post.description: Add a text to user text history

get.description: Get list of saved user vocabs.

patch.description: Update user saved vocab details (level, notes).

get.description: Get a list of saved user meanings.

post.description: Adds a meaning to the saved user meanings.

delete.description: Removes meaning from list of saved user meanings.

get.description: Get a list of vocabs in a text.
Gets a list of user dictionaries.

post.description: Request a password reset token is created and sent to user email

get.description: Get a count of vocabs saved by a user, optionally grouped by language

post.description: Validates password reset token, returns 204 if it's valid, 401 otherwise.

Requests an email reset token to be sent to user email. Used for resending confirmation email. Can optionally change email from sign up.

If user email is already confirmed return 400.

get.summary: Get Saved Vocabs Count Time Series
get.description: Get a count of vocabs saved by a user every `savedOnInterval` between `savedOnFrom` and `savedOnTo`, optionally grouped by language
Redirects to next text in collection or 404 if not found

Unauthenticated.description: User is not authenticated or invalid authentication credentials.

Forbidden.description: User is not allowed to perform this operation.

BadRequest.description:
Bad Request

Some fields are invalid or required fields are missing.

UnsupportedMediaType.description: Unexpected media type or file mime type
